name: [The Nameless]: Chapter One - The Myth of the Error Code
name_original: [The Nameless]: Chapter One - The Myth of the Error Code
description:
The Nameless: Chapter One - The Myth of the Error Code

Version: Early Test Version V0.2

Languages: Simplified Chinese and English(AI translated)

Description:

The Nameless is a fan-made RPG game created with RPG Maker MV, inspired by Lofi-games' Kenshi and Honeydew's First Dance.

Intro:

The Nameless One awakens in the desert, surrounded by endless sand with no signs of life in sight. In the distance, there appears to be a town,the nameless decided to set out and explore......

Currently Playable Content:

  • Chat with NPCs, complete quests, and recruit team members  (Available character: Izumi).
  • Explore the city, and uncover secrets.
  • Collect gears and defeat the Boss.

Chapter One of the game, "The Myth of the Error Code," is currently in development, and an early test version has been released.

Known issues:

  • English text translation is currently incomplete and may have some overlapping issues. Please wait for further updates.

Future Development Plans:

  • Add a complete main storyline.
  • Add character portraits.
  • Add a farming system.
  • Add a relationship system.
  • Add a trading system.
  • Add a food & starvation system.
  • Add new races:  Shek, Hivers, and skeleton.
